CommonEvent.Name: AD Group User Disabled
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: A LogRhythm user was disabled as the result of Active Directory group-based authroization synchronzation.

CommonEvent.Name: Access Revoked Activity
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: General access was revoked from a user or process.

CommonEvent.Name: Account Locked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: User account has been locked out due to exceeding the allowed number of failed logins within a period of time.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Account Disabled/Locked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for disabled/locked accounts in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 8.1.3a, 8.1.4, 8.1.6.a, 8.1.6.b, 8.1.7

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Account Access Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access granting (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked) within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Account Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account disabled within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account locked within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Privilege Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on Privilege Revocation within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Account Access Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access granting (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Account Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on disabled accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Account Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC7.2 by providing details on all account disables.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Account Access Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC7.3, PMC7.6, and PMC7.10 by providing details on all account access revoking activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule directly supports GPG-13 control PMC7.5 by alerting on all account lockouts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Account Access Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access granting (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Account Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on disabled accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13: Network Account Locked Out Status
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates an event and alerts on any network account status change to locked or locked-out to supplement testing of GPG-13 control PMC7.5 [Alert B].

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Account Access Revoked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access revocation (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Account Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on disabled accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: ISO-27001: Account Locked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on locked accounts.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: Account Locked or Disabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE rule creates an event any time an account is locked or disabled within the environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Account Access Revoked Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on account access granting (access revoked, account disabled, account locked, account removed from group, ownership revoked, and privilege revoked) within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: HR Payroll Acct Disable/Enable Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when an HR or Payroll account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Priv Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a privileged account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Vendor Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a vendor account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Default Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a vendor account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: Shared Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a shared account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: BU Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a business user account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: MAS: IT Acct Disabled/Enabled Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This rule creates an event when a IT user account (list) has access revoked (disabled) or granted (enabled) across Critical and Production environments (entity structure).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Account Disabled/Locked
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for disabled/locked accounts.
